Package org.apache.hadoop.hbase.client

Class BufferedMutatorParams

java.lang.Object
org.apache.hadoop.hbase.client.BufferedMutatorParams
All Implemented Interfaces:
Cloneable
@Public public class BufferedMutatorParams extends Object implements Cloneable
Parameters for instantiating a BufferedMutator.

      public BufferedMutatorParams listener(BufferedMutator.ExceptionListener listener)
